a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual plastic waste by disposal method, World, 2000 to 2019
Mismanaged plastic waste includes materials burned in open pits, dumped into seas or open waters, or
disposed of in unsanitary landfills and dumpsites.
Note: Regional aggregates were calculated by Our World in Data and are based on those specified by the OECD .
